text:
The responses from tomcat don't include the Date header.This is causes caching
problems if the servers and/or clients clock is not correct. 

It appears to have been disabled at line 243 of HttpAdapter and line 146 of
HttpResponse.

On my linux system ( in Sydney +11 GMT) the setDateHeader seems to generate a
date stamp by adding 11 hours to my System.currentTimeMillis() rather than
substracting 11 hours.
